client
Class Settings

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          java.awt.Window
              java.awt.Frame
                  javax.swing.JFrame
                      client.Settings
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.accessibility.Accessible, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, LayersIF, java.awt.MenuContainer, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, java.io.Serializable, SettingsIF, javax.swing.WindowConstants
public class Settings
extends javax.swing.JFrame
implements SettingsIF, LayersIF

The class Settings builds a new Window with 3 Tabs. There is a tab for the following settings: - Datenbank: Connection information of the database - Farben: Colormanagement of the map layers - Sonstige: various settings

Author:
Nicolas Fritsch
See Also:
Serialized Form
